Portal is a creative puzzle adventure game with good graphics and a good storyline.  It is a must buy no matter how long ago it came out.  The full game typically only lasts a handful of hours, but some of the more mind bloggling levels and tasks make it excitiing.
2.4 hours is how long it took me to beat the game. Use that information as you wish.
Amazing game with unique game play. Brilliant mechanics and interesting antagonist. Great for casually playing the campaign, or getting extremely frustrated in the challenge versions of the levels.

Portal - игра-головоломка, заставляющая пошевелить Вам извилинками моза и погонять серое вещество. 
  Лично для меня эта игра - шедевр. Создатели постарались и у них получилось то, что надо. Прекрасное, чёткое совмещение действительно трудной головоломки и отборного юмора. Смешные комментарии ГлЭДОС к Вашим действиям вызывают улыбку на лице. В самом начале всё кажется таким лёгким, но через пару комнат у Вам появляются небольшие затруднения, а потом Вы готовы сломать мозг и уже как полчаса торчите в одной комнате, пытаясь хоть как-то продвинуться.
 Плюсы:
1. Графика
2. Головоломки
3. Юмор
4.  Машинки, делающие тапочки для детей-сирот.
 Минусы:
 1. Торт - ложь
 2. Торт - ложь
 3. Торт - ложь.
 
Ставлю этой игре + и советую её всем! Спасибо Valve за Portal!

[h1] Holey moley [/h1]

I have never had more fun falling through the floor. The best part about it though is to land back on my feet after falling through the ceiling onto an elevated platform. How? Because I have made portals, of course. It gets even better if you jump off and end up flying into the attic. What else can you do with your handy dandy portal gun? Make out with yourself, go into an infinite freefall, or mess around with the friendly robots in the Apeture Facility. [spoiler] Hang on, why do some of them have red lasers? Oh shi- [/spoiler]

Where was I. Ah yes, I was supposed to talk about the puzzles, not about how I can abuse my powers. That's why you are reading this. Sorry. The puzzles are really interesting. It mainly focuses on two thing: quick thinking and spartial reasoning. Two questions constantly run through your mind: how can I make that jump and what can kill me. From time to time you get puzzles on how to get something from A to B, such as power blips [spoiler] and missiles [/spoiler]. The context of those puzzles is that you are being tested by GLaDOS for something. [spoiler] Initially at least, but I think you already know that. [/spoiler] It therefore presents a really cool method of making the puzzles harder: at each level, you are given a new idea and problems to try it out with. [spoiler] This culminates into giving you the skills to eventually escape GLaDOS [/spoiler] so basically 80% of the game is tutorial, which was interesting to say the least. 

One slight problem: people like should never play this game. Not because the puzzles are bad but because the whole thing breaks reality so much motion sickness was induced. Portalling from an upper level to a lower was alright because it made sense in my brain but I could not handle falling though a floor into an upper level such as an attic. It is not the game's fault; however, that should be noted for people with a condition like mine. 

Overall I think the game is very well made its popularity is deserved; however, people who are sensitive to motion sickness should not play this game.
Its good.

A great game. With an interesting plot and great visual (this game could run on a potato btw) overall great feel. Overall a great game with no intruding backstory, just straight up gameplay. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who wants to improve on the puzzle skills and want a challenge. the only downfalls would be how short and fast the levels can be solved. I so far I am up to  test chamber 8 with my little amount of play time so don't expect the level to take to long in the beginning. I would rate this game an 92/100.
i don't understand

If there is any one game that I would recommend anybody play, it would have to be Portal. Why?

[list]
[*] Few, easy controls
[*] Excellent, yet simple physics puzzles
[*] No rush, lets players get used to the control scheme w/o dying
[*] Well defined chunks for picking up and putting down on the fly
[*] Witty, sarcastic, deadpan humor from your AI overlord, GlaDOS
[*] Overall short game (2ish hours long)
[*] Uses same small sample of mechanics throughout
[/list]

Overall it's a very simple game that was an afterthought throw-in to the Orange Box along with Half-Life 2 and Team Fortress 2. It has proven to be an incredible game and fantastic entry point into the world of video games for all and sundry, allowing for an enjoyable experience from the most grizzled WoW veteran to a 5 year old child learning hand eye coordination.
Pretty damn entertaining and I got a cake.
One of the best games I've ever played, love the sense of humour and the puzzle element

"We do what we must, because we can" 
- Aperture Science.

n.n"
Im GLaD.. i bought this game..  for SCIENCE!!

Seriously. If your reading this STOP READING THE REVIEWS AND BUY THIS GAME. You should have done it in 2007, you monster.

Portal is a platformer with one interesting aspect - Portals (as you may have guessed). You are in the Aperture Science Computer Aided Enrichment Center guided by GLaDOS, an AI built to guide you through the tests and rate your performance. The concept is quite simple - Get from point A to point B with your portal gun. There's a lot more to it, but I'll let you figure that out.

Do you like box puzzles? 
Do you hate having to walk to get across a room? 
Would you enjoy listening to a passive-aggressive HAL 9000?

If none or more of these apply, Portal is the game for you! This game offers the ability to destroy Einstein's theory of relativity by allowing you to make two points in the world the same. In layman's terms, a portal.
With these portals, you can perform amazing stunts such as redirecting dark energy, moving boxes, incinerating friends, getting to the refrigerator for a soda faster and much more. 

You can get nineteen portal-based puzzles for a low low price of $9.99, but that's not all! If you order now, we'll throw in six more advanced puzzles, free of charge! What are you waiting for? Buy the nine year old FPS puzzle game that has innovated the way that science is done!
Try This Puzzle Game, It's Awsome!!

So, When I first got this game, I was like ew I dont wanna play this, why did I buy it? I came back to it 2 years , later, more mature, smarter, It was one of the best experiences of my life. Portal is by far one of the best games I have ever played along with The Witcher 3, Wolfenstein, and Uncharted, + The last of Us... I think that abou.. Far Cry 3, Tomb Raider. Etc, My point is, this is an excellent game, and if you are a new PC gamer you should def try this, I say new, because if you have been in PC gaming for a while you probably played it. Trust me, Play it, it is only 10 dollars, come on, do it, you won't regret it. The only bad thing about it is I dont get cake at the end. :(
Penso che non abbia bisongo di presentazioni. Fantastico.
Рекомендую
Es un gran juego

v社的脑洞大开，使得FPS游戏又有了新的玩法，解谜

传统FPS玩的是什么？画面，剧情，射击的杀敌的感受
不好意思，本作通通没有，简单的画面，大部分都在室内白白的墙壁
几乎没有剧情，剧情可能就是逃出这个地方，有一些机器人守卫
就是敌人了，但是不能开枪杀死他们，怎么办？智慧
所以请盘起腿坐在凳子上玩，双脚一离地，聪明的智商要占领高地了
你的手里只有一把可以开两个洞（一个蓝洞，一个黄洞）的枪
这两个洞互通，算了，说多了也说不清楚，就靠这这个简单的规则通关
大家还是进游戏自己体验，思考的乐趣

本作用到人的视觉，空间想象力，还有一些基本的解谜要素，帮助你的头脑来通关
游戏缺点？我想一想，好像并没有，谜题偏难？每个人都不同吧，有些人很容易，有些人很难
为什么评价这么高？开动你的脑筋，运用你的能力，这才是游戏应该有的功能吧
至少我个人这么觉得，推荐给那些喜欢解谜游戏，爱动脑筋的小伙伴，传送门。
ótimo jogo

It's Portal.  If you don't know what to expect, then congratulations on reviving from your coma.  This is a game about running, jumping, and using your brain to make Newtonian physics cry at the behest of an artificial intelligence.

... Outwardly.

Beneath the excellent gameplay and black comedy, there is a hidden lore to Portal 1&2 which is almost never directly addressed, only referenced in discreet clues.  Good hunting.  Bring tissues.

Toda a vibe do jogo é maravilhosa, o sentimento de estar sendo observado todo o tempo, o sentimento de que a glados pode te matar a qualquer momento e principalmente o desespero que eu senti nas fases finais quando eu achava uma parte com escritas dos experimentos passados. Ótimo jogo, valve.

Somehow manges to be challenging in the right way by requiring some initiative and not being flat out cheap. The puzzles and level design are still impressive even 9 years later. It can also be visually pleasing even for a 2007 game. The diologue can also be entertaining to listen to. My main problem is that the campaign is very short and can be beaten in around 3-4 hours by a new player. I still highly reccomend Portal and is well worth playing for any fan of puzzle games, Valve games or even FPS games if you want a more refreshing take on these two genres.

A very good opener to this 2-part series. GLaDOS was a great character and made the player always remember that she was right there. This game also made me think outside of the box to complete some of these puzzles. The only complaint I'd say was that the controls personally felt a little weird for me at times. Still a good game overall and in my opinion, has aged very well.

[h1] Amazing! [/h1]

You'd never have thought FPS and puzzle could go together, but Portal made it happen- not only did it do that, but it's a really fun experience. Amazing graphics, sinisterly clinical test chambers and an unforgettable villain in GLaDOS really is the cherry on the cake. If there was cake... but it was all lies!!!

My score: 10/10

This was a very enjoyable game. I loved how funny GLaDOS was, it really made me relax a little when the puzzles where difficult. Sometimes I got stuck but they were of my own accord and not the game's fault, if anything I applaud Portal for making me scratch my head, wondering what happens or what to do next.
Upon completion, I felt kind of empty which is a good thing because it shows just how enjoyable the experience was. One thing I can't compliment it for is the underwhelming boss battle and the shortness of the story, but it is understandable. 
Overall, this is a challening but fun game and I recommend it to anyone with an IQ of 100 or more.
I give this game an 8.5/10

Portal est surment le meilleur des jeux de réflexion à mon actif, il est non seulement BEAUX mais en + les énigmes sont accessible à tous. En parlant des énigmes, Nous avons:

Pour les débutants :
-Les maps "Classique"
Et même pour les adeptes:
-Les maps avancées
Pour aller plus loin:
-Les maps défis

     Ce jeux est passionant par la simplicité des mécanismes pouvant donner des énigmes tout de même complète et varié.
Or, le scénario est certe bien mais aurait amplement put être + poussé.
Mais le point le PLUS IMPORANT: Les portails! Ils sont beaux et passionant, physique respectée au maximum qui vous laissera sans voix pendant vos 1ère heure de jeux

CONCLUSION:::

Avantages:
-Il y en a pour tout les goùt et niveaux
-un mode de jeux avec les commantaires des développeurs (Ingénieux et original)
inconvéniant:
-Scénario sypas mais pas assez poussé (à mon goùt)
Best.
